programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep132
programme.desc: Bubu's Robot - Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn / Banana - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep123
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Fountain Show / The Crew Builds A Carousel - When Sierra Sparkle's big concert stage needs some extra sparkle, Rubble & Crew use a construction complication to make a big splash. // Rubble & Crew decide to go big when Grocer Gabriel wants something special built outside of his grocery store.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure - Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep522
programme.desc: Pups Save a Windy Bay - A super-strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep421
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles / Pups Save the Shivering Sheep - Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. // Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep125
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite - The Crew helps with a parking problem when Caf Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: Dora S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampaada? / If The Boot Fits / Piata Party - Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Splish Spashketball / The Slug Hank Redemption - Baby, Vola, and William head to Hydrospace to take on Shadow's team in the Splashketball Finals. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep719
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. Pancakeio - When Pancakeio the Pancake Wizard takes all the pancakes in Axle City, it's up to Blaze, Stripes, and Starla to become superheroes! Using their Super Wheels, they've got to get those pancakes back- just in time for breakfast!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep403
programme.desc: The Chicken Circus! - Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer / Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Splish Spashketball / The Slug Hank Redemption - Baby, Vola, and William head to Hydrospace to take on Shadow's team in the Splashketball Finals. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep222
programme.desc: Costello Quits - When Costello quits, Vigo sets out to be a supervillain without his henchfishy.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder - Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Dora S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito - Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album. // Dora and Boots help a baby parrot named Lorito find his Mami, but he can't stop copying Boots!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep603

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep58
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Two of the best young players clash at the MCG for the first time as Nick Daicos takes on #1 draft pick Harley Reid. Collingwood have resurrected their Premiership defence after 4 wins and a draw, as the Pies host West Coast.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 35 - Costa visits a tropical oasis, Hannah tours a mushroom tunnel, Millie explores a wildflower reseeding project; Jerry reflects on his 20-year-old garden, and we meet Lachie Weller, a footy player turned prolific gardener.

programme.title: Landline Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Compass Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 38 - Following three families as they honour and treasure the last precious days with their beloved dogs.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep133
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and today's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Palisa Anderson's Water Heart Food Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Palisa Anderson explores her passion for cooking with fresh, seasonal and local produce; she catches up with food author Christine Manfield and the renowned Peter Gilmore of Sydney's Quay Restaurant.

programme.title: Muster Dogs Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - With the 12 month experiment now complete, the Australian Border Collie siblings reunite to face their final challenge. It's neck and neck but one dog shines brighter than the pack and is crowned Champion Muster Dog. (Final)

programme.title: The Family Court Murders Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Debi investigates the unsolved murder of Andrea Blanchard's brother. The judiciary is shaken when bomb blasts shatter the Parramatta Family Court and the home of a third judge, killing his wife.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Locals know him as a flower farmer but Arnold Dix shot to global fame when he helped rescue 41 Indian workers from a tunnel collapse. It turns out Arnold is also a barrister, scientist, engineer and a very unlikely hero.

programme.title: Compass Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 38 - Following three families as they honour and treasure the last precious days with their beloved dogs.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Dr Harry Cooper is Australia's original TV vet and one of our most trusted faces. He built a successful vet practice and then stumbled onto our screens where he's remained ever since. Anh captures his wisdom and passion.

programme.title: Price of Progress: Indonesia's Nickel Rush
programme.desc: The price of our transition to EVs. A mining and refining boom in Indonesia is creating jobs and boosting the economy, transforming lives as Indonesia races to become a global EV hub, powered by nickel.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep38
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Landline Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep38
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Warehouse living in the buzzy inner city was a long held dream for Anita and Kris after years of living in Sydney's suburban south. When the old Newtown Hat Factory comes on the market, they jump in, dazzled by its potential.

programme.title: Insiders Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Two days before the Treasurer delivers the Budget, David Speers and the panel unpack what we know and what to expect, as the Albanese government lays its out its economic blueprint ahead of an election in the next 12 months.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Kelli Underwood and the panel discuss the latest sporting news and issues from the week including AFL, NRL, A-League Men's Semi Finals, Super Rugby, Super Netball and the countdown to the Women's State of Origin.

programme.title: Fancy Fruit Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - They're a mystery to many, but jujubes have been around for thousands of years. Like a small apple or date, they can be eaten fresh or dried. One Australian producer is investing in a big way with plans for export.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - All eyes are on money matters with the Treasurer to deliver the Federal Budget on Tuesday night, a week after the latest Reserve Bank decision on interest rates. Rachel Pupazzoni breaks it all down with what you need to know.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep96
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Bridget Brennan, Charles Brice and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep96
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the morning to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep96
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep30
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Tino Carnevale meets a dietitian gardening for health; Millie Ross conserves rare plants; Josh Byrne grows edible perennials; Clarence Slockee visits a youth justice project; and Jerry Coleby-Williams profiles palms.

programme.title: Muster Dogs Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - With the 12 month experiment now complete, the Australian Border Collie siblings reunite to face their final challenge. It's neck and neck but one dog shines brighter than the pack and is crowned Champion Muster Dog. (Final)

programme.title: Landline Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep76
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep96
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Kathryn Robinson brings you a comprehensive summary of today's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Catherine and Mick found love later in life. After both confronting health issues, they realised there was no time like the present to build their dream home atop the spectacular hills of South Australia's Fleurieu Peninsula.

programme.title: 8 Nights Out West Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Writer Claire Cao treats Arka to her dad's home-made Burmese snacks before they head to Blacktown for a sumptuous meal at one of Western Sydney's only Burmese restaurants, with actor Jing-Xuan Chan.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep134
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and today's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep73
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep96
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep61
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - On the night before the Treasurer hands down the 2024 Federal Budget, Kirsten Aiken and The Business team bring you everything you need to know and all the details we have so far.

programme.title: The World Ep77
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Now at the new earlier time of 9pm AEST, Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news from correspondents and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - In the decades since the Korean war, over 200,000 children have been adopted to families worldwide. Now as adults, adoptees are demanding investigations into falsified documents, duplicate identities and even stolen children.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - We hear from a group of people forcibly returned to Tonga despite having little to no connection with the Kingdom. Plus how science could help prove a famous story passed down through oral tradition in Solomon Islands.

programme.title: Q+A Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 17 - Patricia Karvelas leads the conversation as citizens put their questions to local and international politicians and thought leaders. Q+A brings together a range of guests to debate the big issues affecting Australians.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep96
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

programme.title: The Business Ep61
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - On the night before the Treasurer hands down the 2024 Federal Budget, Kirsten Aiken and The Business team bring you everything you need to know and all the details we have so far.

programme.title: India Votes 2024 Ep6

programme.title: The Family Court Murders Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Debi investigates the unsolved murder of Andrea Blanchard's brother. The judiciary is shaken when bomb blasts shatter the Parramatta Family Court and the home of a third judge, killing his wife.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Catherine and Mick found love later in life. After both confronting health issues, they realised there was no time like the present to build their dream home atop the spectacular hills of South Australia's Fleurieu Peninsula.

programme.title: The Business Ep61
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - On the night before the Treasurer hands down the 2024 Federal Budget, Kirsten Aiken and The Business team bring you everything you need to know and all the details we have so far.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep73

programme.title: Belonging(s) Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - We look at a long scroll depicting early Chinese Australians as laundry workers among others. Plus we see a drum kit used by the late Alma Quan, a musician who coached debutante dance routines.

programme.title: The World Ep77

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Josh Byrne meets an ornithologist to learn about supporting birds in backyards; Costa and junior gardener Caylee create magical miniature gardens; Sophie Thomson meets a group redistributing cafe waste to backyard composters.

programme.title: UFC 301: Pantoja vs. Erceg
programme.desc: Prelims - Rapidly turning into a dominant fighter settling in for a long reign at the top, UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil on Saturday, May 4, to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event of UFC 301 at Farmasi Arena in Rio de Janeiro. Winner of five in a row, Pantoja has been a man on a mission, and after a 2023 campaign in which he won and defended his title against Brandon Moreno and Brandon Royval, hes back to meet Erceg, who is perfect in three trips to the Octagon. Plus, the King of Rio returns to the Octagon, as UFC Hall of Famer Jose Aldo makes the walk for the first time since 2022 to face Jonathan Martinez
